pathParameters.name: scope
pathParameters.description: The scope of the custom recommendation. Valid scopes are: management group (format: 'providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'), or security connector (format: 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Security/securityConnectors/{securityConnectorName})'
